value.title: Download and Deploy a K12 Power BI Solution for schools
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick shares a Power BI solution he created for K12 schools in United States education. This solution includes instructions to create views for use with the Power BI reports. It also includes a Power BI Desktop template for pre-created reports based on your school data.  GitHub Repo

images.title: Download and Deploy a K12 Power BI Solution for schools

value.title: Easily convert your Excel Power Pivot model to Power BI
value.excerpt: Take your Power Pivot model in Excel and easily convert it to Power BI in just a few steps. Patrick looks at a few different ways to do this.  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************  Want to take your Power BI skills to the next level? value.title: How the Power BI Data Region is selected
value.excerpt: In this video, I look at how the Power BI data region is selected. This is the what you see when you go to About Power BI and see "Your data is stored in". You should take care to make sure this is where the majority of users you are before anyone signs up for Office 365, Power BI or other Microsoft

value.title: How to create Sparklines, indicators and conditional formatting in Power BI Paginated Reports
value.excerpt: Patrick walks finishes his look at Paginated Reports in Power BI. He shows you how to create sparklines, indicators and conditional formatting within the Paginated Report using Report Builder.  LET'S CONNECT! value.title: Tooltips, tooltips, tooltips in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick shows how you can display multiple values within a tooltip for a visual. He walks through the DAX measure and also shows some pitfalls to look out for when it comes to filter context.  Go here for the sample DAX statement: https://guyinacube.com/2017/06/tooltips-tooltips-tooltips-power-bi/

value.title: What is a Power BI tenant? (Office 365 / Azure Active Directory)

value.excerpt: Datetime related calculations are some of the most common, yet confusing, calculations for people who are new to Power BI. Time intelligence calculations, e.g. month-over-month growth, year-to-date total, etc. are even more difficult to get right consistently. In this session I will reveal how Power

value.title: How to Manage a Global Supply Chain with Power BI 🔴Talk Power BI LIVE (Subscribe & Join)
value.excerpt: Business is increasingly global, with supply chain crossing multiple vendors across country and continents.  Can Power BI help you manage the global Supply Chain? How can it make you more efficient? More resilient? Save you money? Find out in this special session with our guest: Christian Osborn https://www.linkedin.com/in/christianosborn/

value.title: Power BI Drill Through: 5 Different Alternatives That May be Better For You!
value.excerpt: Power BI Drill Through isn’t always the best option to show more detail. There are alternatives that may work better for you. value.title: PowerBI.tips - Tutorial - Monkey Tool Introduction - Part 1

Come join us to learn about how this tool can help you in your daily work flow.  Follow Ken  Blog: https://xlguru.ca/blog

value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - Stacked Bar Chart with Grand Totals
value.excerpt: This week we look at building a stacked bar chart on https://Charts.PowerBI.Tips  There is a little trick that you need to know no how to add a Y-Axis to the chart.  Additionally, at the end of the video we also show how to add a Grand Total for each bar column.    Visit our Site: https://powerbi.tips/
